title: The Working at Height Permit Template: Beyond the Paperwork

hero_image.alt: Hero image for The Working at Height Permit Template: Beyond the Paperwork

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, high-quality image of a modern industrial manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of maintenance technicians (men and women) are conducting a safety briefing. One technician is holding a tablet (screen not visible) showing a digital checklist, while pointing toward a high-level overhead crane structure in the background. They are wearing full PPE including hard hats, safety glasses, high-visibility vests, and fall protection harnesses. The lighting is bright and professional, highlighting the clean, organized nature of the facility. The background shows industrial machinery and yellow safety walkways. No text or words in the image.
